parse-surefire-report.description: Parses surefire and failsafe XML reports and outputs a summary report. See help for more details.

jdk-manager.description: A utility to manage JDK's for local usage.

echo-server.description: A utility which echos output from a TCP socket, UDP socket or HTTP server to stdout.

jira-from-pr.description: Creates a JIRA based on a GitHub PR. Please note this is very specific to Red Hat JIRA and GitHub.

zip-util.description: A utility to query, recursively, information in a ZIP, JAR, WAR, etc. file.
